skills.skill: Leading focus groups with diverse stakeholders

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead focus groups and discussions with diverse stakeholders to address issues of diversity, equity, and inclusion.
Develop equity protocols, surveys, and questionnaires to gather necessary data and insights for DEI initiatives.
Analyze both qualitative and quantitative data related to diversity, equity, and inclusion efforts.
Write technical reports on DEI findings and recommendations.
Provide leadership and consulting in areas of DEI, anti-racism, and culturally responsive education.
